SEECALINE was evaluated by the World Bank in two different ways:
First, Galasso and Yau (31) utilized monitoring data to estimate improvements in the 
nutritional status of child participants. Over the course of 3 years, there was approximately 
a 7–9 ppt decrease in underweight prevalence among programme participants (2.33–
3.0 ppt/year). Galasso and Yau ( 31) found that “the returns are decreasing as time and
